projects.title: WWF Together

projects.summary: Led the development of an award-winning interactive experience that connected users with endangered species through immersive storytelling and innovative interactions.

projects.title: Expressable

projects.summary: Created a comprehensive digital platform for speech therapy services, enabling remote therapy sessions and progress tracking for patients of all ages.

projects.title: Watch Dogs Digital Shadow
projects.subtitle: Interactive digital privacy experience
projects.summary: Developed a viral marketing campaign for Ubisoft's Watch Dogs that demonstrated digital privacy vulnerabilities by analyzing users' social media presence.

projects.title: Volvo XC90

projects.title: Gap 1969 Stylestream

projects.title: Shopify Ventures

projects.title: Guarantors

projects.title: Lifelines
